fileSelect.dragDrop: Drag and drop your video files here

download.title: Encoding Video
download.cancelConfirmDetail: Video encoding is currently in progress. Canceling will lose all progress made so far. Are you sure you want to cancel?
download.closeDetail: Are you sure you want to close the download dialog? Since encoding hasn't started yet, you can restart the download at any time.
download.explanation: This will merge all Tesla dashcam footage into a single video file with the same layout as the viewer
download.qualityNote: ⚠️ Resolution, bitrate, and FPS may be reduced from original due to browser encoding limitations
download.note: Note: The encoding process may take a few minutes depending on video length.
download.browserWarning: ⚠️ This feature uses MediaRecorder API, Canvas API, and advanced video codecs. Browser support is limited and unexpected issues like frame drops may occur.
download.unsupportedBrowser: ❌ Your browser does not support the required encoding technologies (MediaRecorder API, Canvas API, or video codecs). Please use a modern browser like Chrome, Firefox, or Edge.

layout.title: Video Layout Configuration
layout.instructions: Drag and drop cameras to rearrange the video layout
